description: Live drawing options for when user mouse actions trigger live screen drawing of page items.

properties.description: Never use live screen drawing during mouse operations, use sprite mode.
properties.name: NEVER

properties.description: Use live screen drawing during mouse operations.
properties.name: IMMEDIATELY

properties.description: Use live screen drawing during mouse operations after a delay if user pauses before the mouse moves.
properties.name: DELAYED

name: LiveDrawingOptions
